content.rendered:
Class Info

Next Virtual Info Sessions

Get all your questions answered during a live meeting with CTD staff, students, and apprentices!

Tuesday, April 5, 2022
8:30pm EST (5:30pm PST)
Zoom


REGISTER HERE

After registering, you will receive a confirmation email containing information about joining the meeting.

What to expect in a CTD class

Considering whether or not to apply? Hear what current interns say about CTD classes:
